name: MEAddressAnnotation
desc: An object that indicates the validity of an email address.

items.name: class func success(withLocalizedDescription: String) -> MEAddressAnnotation
items.desc: Indicates an address is valid and correct.

items.name: class func warning(withLocalizedDescription: String) -> MEAddressAnnotation
items.desc: Indicates an address may be invalid or needs attention.

items.name: class func error(withLocalizedDescription: String) -> MEAddressAnnotation
items.desc: Indicates an address is invalid and may result in failure to deliver a message.
